tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://x.com/Koichi_Tsuru)

He is an arranger and composer who is a member of POPHOLIC and has worked with various artists such as [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/Yui-Ogura), [Akari Kitou](https://anilist.co/staff/119722/Akari-Kitou) and [Aguri Onishi](https://anilist.co/staff/132804/Aguri-Onishi).

[Website](http://supalove.com/category/introduction/koji-matsuzaka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koji_matsuzaka)

Matsuzaka Kouji is a composer and arranger. He is affiliated with Supa Love.

[Twitter](https://x.com/Koichi_Tsuru)

He is an arranger and composer who is a member of POPHOLIC and has worked with various artists such as [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/Yui-Ogura), [Akari Kitou](https://anilist.co/staff/119722/Akari-Kitou) and [Aguri Onishi](https://anilist.co/staff/132804/Aguri-Onishi).
